channel.title: Publications on David Childers
channel.description: Recent content in Publications on David Childers

item.title: Solution of Rational Expectations Models with Function Valued States
item.description: Previous versions of this paper circulated under the title On the Solution and Application of Rational Expectations Models with Function-Valued States

item.title: Computational Methods for Economic Models with Function Valued States
item.description: Portions of this PhD thesis have been adapted into the paper Solution of Rational Expectations Models with Function Valued States. The thesis contains additional results including a very different algorithm for the non-compact case, expanded analysis of the economic geography model, and additional numerical applications.
